title: Project manager
description: Smashing Boxes project managers aren’t merely taskers or go-betweens. PM’s are expected to take a proactive role in projects, steering both clients and team members towards solutions that stay within timeline and budget constraints.
responsibilities:
• Develop and manage project production schedules
  • Track weekly budgets and project status
  • Meet with clients on a weekly basis
  • Work with operations to properly resource projects to meet timeline goals
  • Manage project scope and maintain clear project requirements
  • Help define and obtain estimates for project requirements
  • Provide project documentation and record keeping
  • Task and monitor team members to ensure timely delivery of work
  • Build and maintain positive relationships with clients
  • Contribute to company processes and proactively identify areas for improvement
lookingFor:
• Exceptional communication skills
  • Integrity and a direct attitude
  • Basic HTML/CSS knowledge. You can talk the talk even if you can’t code.
  • Salesmanship and presentation chops
  • You can anticipate problems and risks in advance, and change plans accordingly
  • Passion for new technologies
  • Detail oriented
  • Multi-tasking – you’d actually prefer to be involved in multiple things at once
  • Prior interactive / digital marketing account or project management experience (agency experience is a plus!)
  • Experience with Google Apps (Basecamp and Harvest are additional bonuses)
